root.name: Sherlock Holmes: Secret of the Silver Earring
root.description: Overview Secret of the Silver Earring is a new story roughly based on the characters of Sir Arthur Conan Doyle mystery novels. In this classically styled point-and-click adventure, players take the roll of both Holmes and Dr. Watson as each has opportunities to interrogate suspects, dig for clues, and make deductions. Plot Sherlock Holmes: Secret of the Silver Earring opens on a gala being held at Sherringford Hall by Sir Melvyn Bromsby in honor of his daughter, Lavinia, returning from school abroad. With the Gallia, famous singer, preforming during the reception and rumors of an important business announcement planned for the opening address the party is crowded with people egarly awaiting the opening speech, but Sir Melvyn Bromsby's welcome is cut short as he falls to the floor with a red stain spreading over his chest.
